Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G03# As a Staff member, i want to #remove# a #hold#,

Texts of USs.US1: #G03# As a Staff member, I want to Apply a Hold, so that I can prevent progression through the workflow or other actions in the system until the issue is resolved.
